topics.body: !http://37.media.tumblr.com/ee84b1661ef35da5cfc87dfb8e140a0a/tumblr_n7eayyiGyM1qzcv7no1_1280.png!

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a26fca6368726cc16b0100#post_53a26fca6368726cc16b0100
I mentioned some over in the video games thread, but its worth repeating a couple.

Demon Gaze is a pretty decent dungeon crawler that scratches certain hardcore itches for me with an honestly pretty punishing difficulty. The story is pretty bad, but its bad in an amusing way at least.

Hotline Miami is arguably at its best on a handheld given the speed of its gameplay and missions, and is worth at least checking out regardless of platform.
